name: Query
title: Gcloud
Datastore
Query
description:
Query

Represents the search criteria against a Datastore.

examples.code:
query = Gcloud::Datastore::Query.new
query.kind("Task").
  where("completed", "=", true)

entities = dataset.run query

methods.name: kind
title: Gcloud
Datastore
Query#kind
methods.description: Add the kind of entities to query.

examples.code:
query = Gcloud::Datastore::Query.new
query.kind "Task"

all_tasks = dataset.run query

methods.name: where
title: Gcloud
Datastore
Query#where
methods.description: Add a property filter to the query.

examples.code:
query = Gcloud::Datastore::Query.new
query.kind("Task").
  where("completed", "=", true)

completed_tasks = dataset.run query

methods.name: ancestor
title: Gcloud
Datastore
Query#ancestor
methods.description: Add a filter for entities that inherit from a key.

examples.code:
query = Gcloud::Datastore::Query.new
query.kind("Task").
  ancestor(parent.key)

completed_tasks = dataset.run query

methods.name: order
title: Gcloud
Datastore
Query#order
methods.description: Sort the results by a property name. By default, an ascending sort order will be used. To sort in descending order, provide a second argument of a string or symbol that starts with “d”.

examples.code:
query = Gcloud::Datastore::Query.new
query.kind("Task").
  order("due", :desc)

sorted_tasks = dataset.run query

methods.name: limit
title: Gcloud
Datastore
Query#limit
methods.description: Set a limit on the number of results to be returned.

examples.code:
query = Gcloud::Datastore::Query.new
query.kind("Task").
  limit(10)

paginated_tasks = dataset.run query

methods.name: offset
title: Gcloud
Datastore
Query#offset
methods.description: Set an offset for the results to be returned.

examples.code:
query = Gcloud::Datastore::Query.new
query.kind("Task").
  limit(10).
  offset(20)

paginated_tasks = dataset.run query

methods.name: start
title: Gcloud
Datastore
Query#start
methods.description: Set the cursor to start the results at.

examples.code:
query = Gcloud::Datastore::Query.new
query.kind("Task").
  limit(10).
  cursor(task_cursor)

paginated_tasks = dataset.run query

methods.name: select
title: Gcloud
Datastore
Query#select
methods.description: Retrieve only select properties from the matched entities.

examples.code:
query = Gcloud::Datastore::Query.new
query.kind("Task").
  select("completed", "due")

partial_tasks = dataset.run query

methods.name: group_by
title: Gcloud
Datastore
Query#group_by
methods.description: Group results by a list of properties.

examples.code:
query = Gcloud::Datastore::Query.new
query.kind("Task").
  group_by("completed")

grouped_tasks = dataset.run query
